title: Giro d’Italia Stage 16: Disgusting Weather Doesn’t Stop Tadej Pogačar and His Pink Jersey Romp
content:
Pogačar rules shortened, weather-stricken mountain test for fifth stage-win, Thomas loses time to Martínez in podium battle.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 16: Disgusting Weather Doesn’t Stop Tadej Pogačar and His Pink Jersey Romp on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
